segments.text: Hello sir , welcome to Pistolera restaurant . May I take your order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would like the chicken cheese enchiladas with a side of guacamole .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ' m sorry sir , but we ran out of chicken . May I suggest our delicious beef burritos or cheese quesadillas ? Both include a side of guacamole and jalapenos .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure I ' ll have the burrito . Do you have nachos ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course sir . Our nachos come with melted cheese and chili .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like anything to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I ' ll have a Corona .
segments.speaker: S2
